analyzed: #/ // / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: dngos kun rang bzhin stong bdag nyid ;

original: / dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: / dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid //

analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin //

original: gnyis med de la rab tu 'dud //
analyzed: gnyis med de la rab tu 'dud //

original: ye shes kun btus rgyud las ni //
analyzed: ye shes kun btus rgyud las ni //

original: rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud dgrol lugs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud dgrol lugs //

original: phyir bshad // rnal 'byor rgyud tshul gang la yang //
analyzed: phyir bshad // rnal 'byor rgyud tshul gang la yang //
translated: In any Yoga Tantra system,

analyzed: rgyud tshul rnam pa gsum du snang //

original: rgyu yi rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud //
analyzed: rgyu yi rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud //

analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyud ces mkhas pas bshad //

original: rgyud la gang zag mtha' yas kyang //
analyzed: rgyud la gang zag mtha' yas kyang //

original: cung zad dbye na rnam pa lnga ;
analyzed: cung zad dbye na rnam pa lnga ;

analyzed: / rin chen tsandan padma dang // pad dkar autpala zhes gsungs //

original: de la bsdus pa rnam gnyis te //
analyzed: de la bsdus pa rnam gnyis te //

analyzed: tshogs dang slob ma'i gang zag go // de dag re re dag la yang //

original: chos smra ba dang sgrub byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos smra ba dang sgrub byed pa'o //

analyzed: rgyan ni lnga pa drug par bshad //

analyzed: gleng bslang lnga dang mtha' drug rgyan //

analyzed: brda yi rgyud la 'jug pa yin //

analyzed: rigs pa rnam bzhi bshad pa bzhi //

analyzed: gleng bslad dbye na rnam pa lnga //

analyzed: cung zad rim par dbye bar bya //

analyzed: brda yi rgyud du gsungs pa yi //

analyzed: ming dang ched dang byed pa po //

analyzed: tshad dag dang ni dgos pa'o //

analyzed: ming ni khri sum stong phrag bzhi //

original: ka nas ya yi bar du ni //
analyzed: ka nas ya yi bar du ni //

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa drug ming gi mtha'o //

original: brda yis mtshon nas don la ni //
analyzed: brda yis mtshon nas don la ni //

analyzed: 'jug byed de yang thabs kyi rgyud //

original: don ni rigs pa bzhir bshad pa //
analyzed: don ni rigs pa bzhir bshad pa //

analyzed: chags bral chags bcas dbang du'o //

analyzed: mi yi skye 'khrungs 'thad pa sgrub //

analyzed: khyim nas byung ba bya ba med //

analyzed: 'dul dang sdom pa la ltos pa'o //

analyzed: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga //

original: dbang po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga //

original: ltos pa rang gi mtshan ma la'o //
analyzed: ltos pa rang gi mtshan ma la'o //

original: spros bcas la sogs spyod pa yi //
analyzed: spros bcas la sogs spyod pa yi //

original: cho nyid kyis ni 'bras 'byung ba //
analyzed: cho nyid kyis ni 'bras 'byung ba //

original: chags bcas rigs pa bzhir 'dod do //
analyzed: chags bcas rigs pa bzhir 'dod do //

original: bshad gzhi yig don spyi yi don //
analyzed: bshad gzhi yig don spyi yi don //

original: sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug pa'o //

analyzed: sgra yi bkod pa bstan bcos bzhin //

original: don gyis bkod pa'i yi ge'i don //
analyzed: don gyis bkod pa'i yi ge'i don //

original: tshig gcig 'bras bu bsnyen mthong ba //
analyzed: tshig gcig 'bras bu bsnyen mthong ba //

original: yul ring 'jug pa'i blo bzlog ste //
analyzed: yul ring 'jug pa'i blo bzlog ste //

analyzed: 'bras don gzhan don bskyed rim la //

analyzed: sbyor ba dang po la sogs pa //

analyzed: rgyas bshad don ni spyi yi don //

analyzed: lam gyur don yod dang // snang gsum rtogs pas don yod pa'i //

original: mi bstan sbas don rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: mi bstan sbas don rnam pa gsum //
translated: The three topics of the ultimate meaning areüîΩthe teaching of the utterly pure meaning,

original: yang dag don nyid ston pa dang // don dam la bden gnyis med thob //
analyzed: yang dag don nyid ston pa dang // don dam la bden gnyis med thob //

analyzed: 'od gsal ba dang zung 'jug ste //

original: mthar thug pa ni yin par gsungs //
analyzed: mthar thug pa ni yin par gsungs //

original: kun rdzob nges par shes par bya //
analyzed: kun rdzob nges par shes par bya //

original: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba //

original: don dam du ni gang bstan pa //
analyzed: don dam du ni gang bstan pa //

original: rdzogs ba sgrub par byed pa ste //
analyzed: rdzogs ba sgrub par byed pa ste //

original: don gyi rgyud du bstan pa yin //
analyzed: don gyi rgyud du bstan pa yin //

analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum //

original: thun mong mchog dang gnyi ga yi //
analyzed: thun mong mchog dang gnyi ga yi //

original: 'bras bur rgyal ba dam pas gsungs //
analyzed: 'bras bur rgyal ba dam pas gsungs //

original: thun mong grub pa brgyad la sogs //
analyzed: thun mong grub pa brgyad la sogs //

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim ba'i nus pa yin //

analyzed: mchog ni sangs rgyas go 'phang ste //

analyzed: zung 'jug rim pa mthar phyin na //

analyzed: mchog la thun mong yod ma yin //

original: de dag gnyis su yod ma yin //

analyzed: sa bon lta bu yin pas na //

original: kun la dgos pa'i 'bras bu rin po che //
analyzed: kun la dgos pa'i 'bras bu rin po che //
translated: May the precious fruit that is necessary for allüîΩBe obtained in the mind-stream of yogins.

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyi rgyud la thob par shog / rgyan bdun rnam par dgrol ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyi rgyud la thob par shog / rgyan bdun rnam par dgrol ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The one called The Unlocking of the Seven Ornaments

original: aa ts'a rya shraddh'a ga ra wa rmas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: aa ts'a rya shraddh'a ga ra wa rmas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: Is finished.üîΩBy Acharya Shri Dharmarakshita

original: // / pandi ta de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: // / pandi ta de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o /
translated: And the great translator, the monk Rinchen Zangpo.
